パッケージ ch.uzh.ifi.seal.changedistiller.distilling.refactoring

クラス RefactoringCandidate

java.lang.Object
ch.uzh.ifi.seal.changedistiller.distilling.refactoring.RefactoringCandidate
public final class RefactoringCandidate
extends java.lang.Object
A refactoring candidate is a container class that stores a SourceCodeChange with a StructureDiffNode.

Distiller decides according to the StructureDiffNode whether the corresponding SourceCodeChange may be refactoring candidate. That is, when the change is either a attribute/class/method insert or delete.

Concrete refactoring helper use these candidate to find related insert and delete operations of attributes, classes, or methods.

作成者:
fluri
関連項目:
Distiller, AbstractRefactoringHelper
